description: The best of Adventure Ridge in Heritage Woods! END unit with a spacious, family friendly floor plan and 9ft ceilings. Custom maple Kitchencraft cabinetry, tile splash, granite counters and stainless appliances. Laminate flooring throughout. Convenient main floor powder room . Ground level walk-out patio and fenced yard off the kitchen. Big covered deck off the living room. 3 Beds and 2 full baths upstairs. Large rec room (or 4th brm) with window,10ft ceiling and full 3 pc bath. Double side by side garage. Many upgrades: kitchen, flooring, furnace, hot water tank and appliances. Well run strata with new roof and gutters 2022, and vinyl fences 2024. Fabulous location, walk to all levels of schooling, parks, trails, and on the bus route to skytrain.
